thread.section_title: PickleballCentral Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PickleballCentral | pickleballcentral.com | 3 of 114
thread.title: Sharon

author: Sharon
title: Sharon
text:
Thank you to Pickleball Central staff who were very helpful in our club's purchase of the Pickleball Tutor. They were able to assist me with questions that I had and referred me to John Cowley who provided further information on the Tutor's settings to follow.
Thank you Pickleball Central as its a pleasure to contact you as your staff is very helpful in decisions needed to purchase paddles, balls, nets, etc.
Thank you, Sharon
Peachtree City Pickleball Club
Peachtree City, GA
